sense.def:
Predmet ali površina, ki je
plain
, je samo ene barve in na njej ni nobenega vzorca, risbe ali napisa.

seg.quote: They are set against a plain background with carefully controlled lighting.

sense.def:
Stvari, ki so
plain
, so zelo preprosto narejene.

seg.quote: She felt ashamed of her plain dress.
I enjoy good plain food; nothing fancy.

sense.def:
Kadar je dejstvo, položaj ali izjava
plain
, jo je lahko prepoznati ali razumeti.

seg.quote: It was plain that Eddie wanted to get back to sleep.

sense.def:
Besedo
plain
lahko uporabimo pred samostalnikom ali pridevnikom, ki ga želimo poudariti.

seg.quote: Petty is the wrong word. It's plain meanness.
Logical judgment can also be just plain wrong.

sense.def:
Dekle ali ženska, ki je
plain
, ni lepa.

A plain
je veliko ravno zemljišče z zelo malo drevesi.
